job_title: Account Manager – Business To Business Sales-Training Provided
job_description:
Company Description:

We. Are. OneStaff. Medical. An independently-owned, nationally-recognized and amazingly awesome staffing firm looking for like-minded talent to add to our internal team! A work ethic forged in the Midwest, we are growing quickly, and want the right talent, looking to be challenged and grow with us in this amazing phase of our company. We promise you an open-door policy where your great ideas will be listened to by managers, and our owners, and you can truly see your individual impact on the business. If you have the drive, consider yourself a true self-starter wanting to see the impact you can make, and are motivated and awesome individual, then come be awesome with us!

Start your professional career with OneStaff Medical.

Be bold. Enjoy work again.Let us help.
• Weekly amount stated in the job postings is scaled based on estimated hourly wages and potential stipends available for the location of the assignment. Hourly wages are based on various factors including but not limited to: experience, demand, availability, location, etc. Please contact one of our amazing OneStaff Recruiting Specialists for more details.
• *Equal Opportunity Employer**

Job Summary:

Do you enjoy the thrill of the “Sales Hunt”? Onestaff Medical has experienced tremendous growth over the past 12 months and trends continue to climb! With our growth we need innovative, tenacious and energetic sales professionals to develop and cultivate leads, build relationships and close deals! If you are seeking a career with an organization that has tremendous opportunity for personal and professional growth, an energetic and exciting environment, we are your choice!

#osmcareers

Responsibilities:

COLD CALLING, LOTS OF COLD CALLING. Build and develop long term relationships via cold calling Healthcare facilities to staff Nursing positions. Facilitate the hiring process between candidate and client. Manage day to day business operations as necessary.

Requirements :

Previous phone sales & business to business sales & recruitment experience a plus but not required. What we really want is someone who is intelligent, driven & enjoys the thrill of the hunt! Candidates must be able to work well in a team environment but thrive independently. Motivated, self-started, energetic and a positive attitude A MUST! Onestaff Medical offers a great sales opportunity to grow with the organization and become a pillar for success! We also offer: Competitive base salary plus generous bonus structure. Full benefits package including: health, dental, vision, life and 401k with a company match. Seasoned training program that will provide you with the necessary tools, skills and pathway for success! Career advancement????? Be Bold and hang on for the ride!!!!!! If you want to create your future instead of waiting for it to come to you apply today

Education:
High School

Benefits:

While working with OneStaff Medical you will enjoy top-tier benefits such as:
• 401(k)
• 401(k) matching
• Dental insurance
• Disability insurance
• Employee assistance program
• Employee discounts
• Health insurance
• Lifie insurance
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance
• *Equal Opportunity Employer**

Motivated, self-started, energetic and a positive attitude A MUST!
